channel.title: Kubeflow中文文档 – 在云端安装
channel.description: Recent content in 在云端安装 on Kubeflow中文文档

item.title: Docs: AWS for Kubeflow
item.description: Please refer to the deployment section in the AWS docs for information on setting up your AWS environment and deploying Kubeflow on Amazon Elastic Kubernetes Service (Amazon EKS).

item.title: Docs: Azure for Kubeflow
item.description: Please refer to the deployment section in the Azure docs for information on setting up your Azure environment and deploying Kubeflow on an existing Azure Resource Group or Cluster for AKS (Azure Kubernetes Service).

item.title: Docs: Google Cloud for Kubeflow
item.description: For details on setting up your GCP environment and deploying Kubeflow on Kubernetes Engine (GKE), refer to the deployment section of the Kubeflow GCP documentation.

item.title: Docs: IBM Cloud for Kubeflow
item.description: Please refer to the installation section in the IBM docs for information on setting up your IKS environment and deploying Kubeflow on IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service (IKS).
